about_the_game:
SPACE WALK puts you in the role of a lone astronaut stationed on A.S.T.R.A. Station 92, a space station orbiting the moon. Your mission: conduct scientific experiments, maintain the station’s systems, and pursue critical research that may lead to groundbreaking discoveries on the moon.

From the quiet stillness of space to the alien beauty of the lunar landscape, it immerses you in a deeply atmospheric experience where every task is hands-on. You’ll manage the station’s resources, repair critical systems, and perform maintenance to keep the station operational—all while preparing for the challenges that await on the moon below.

With a focus on exploration and environmental storytelling, SPACE WALK thrusts you into the unknown. In this thrilling journey, every decision could uncover groundbreaking revelations—or lead to perilous consequences.

KEY FEATURES:

  • Lunar Exploration: 

    Experience the awe of the moon as you conduct experiments and collect scientific samples. Prepare for each mission carefully, as you must monitor your vitals and manage limited resources, ensuring a safe return to the station.

  • Interactive Physics Environment:

    Almost every object in SPACE WALK can be interacted with. Perform hands-on tasks, operate machinery, and experience the challenge of managing a dynamic physics-based environment, where low and zero gravity add unique complexities to every action.

  • Space Station Maintenance:

    Ensure A.S.T.R.A. Station 92 remains functional by handling repairs, system reboots, and calibrations. From managing solar panels to overseeing life support, your efforts are essential to keeping the station operational.

  • Gravity:

    Outside the station, you’ll float in zero gravity. Inside, the station simulates moon gravity, letting you move with less effort, while the moon’s surface offers even lower gravity for greater leaps.

  • Tools and Exploration:

    As you navigate the station and the moon’s surface, you’ll discover a variety of tools essential for survival and mission success. Each tool offers unique ways to interact with your environment.

  • Injury System:

    Injuries affect gameplay. A concussion impairs vision, arm injuries may disable tool use and leg injuries reduce mobility, forcing you to adapt to each situation.

content_descriptors.notes: SPACE WALK contains themes of isolation, survival, and existential dread, with moments designed to evoke tension and unease. Players may encounter situations involving injury (e.g., concussions, limb damage) and environmental hazards that contribute to a sense of peril. Its dark and mysterious atmosphere, combined with certain story elements, may be unsettling to some players. I recommend this game for mature audiences who are comfortable with thriller and suspense themes.

name: SPACE WALK

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 bit Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970/1650 / AMD Radeon R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64 bit Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i9-9900K / AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2070 / AMD Radeon RX 5700XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

short_description: SPACE WALK is a first-person sci-fi experience that immerses you in the life of an astronaut. Discover the wonders of the moon, interact with your surroundings, and maintain your space station. In the vast emptiness of space, every discovery could change everything—or nothing at all.
